input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Investment Performance Report

Hello Customer Support, I have noticed some discrepancies in the latest investment performance report My name is Elena Ivanova.. It might be due to changes in the data source integration. I have tried reverting to the previous version and validated the input data for accuracy, but the issue still persists. These discrepancies are causing inconsistencies in our financial analysis and decision-making processes. I would appreciate it if you could look into this matter urgently and provide a solution or guidance to resolve the issue You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. Please let us know if you require any additional information.
